poem:
"Pharmaceutical Symphony"

A song of cells and synthesis,
The optimism of morning-board meetings,
Uncontained within AstraZeneca's walls.
Beyond the corporate chambers and glass test tubes,
In the coming shadows of the decade,
A projected $80bn chorus of hopes and sorrows,
Unfurling cords of compassionate chemistry.
written on the parchment of life,
By the hand of human wisdom,
Writes a remarkable future, waiting to be cured.
